item.description:
If you are around for the holidays and want a night out, please join in. There will be at least two DJs at the 201 bar (relatively new bar with dance floor at 201 Westminster downtown). These DJs have played at local 121.

No guarantee about the music but it's probably alternative (could be old 80s) or funk/r&b or throw in a Prince song. In any case, we've danced to RJ's spinning at Local 121 before and it was really fun (we packed the floor all night long!).

They also have 2 pool tables, a large bar and sitting area if dancing is not your thing, but socializing is.

Hope to see you, otherwise Happy Holidays!
item.how_to_find_us: On or near the dance floor in the back.
item.name: DANCE DANCE DANCE
